participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and passionate about animals, with a creative side for performing arts.
participant_1.background: My dogs are the most precious things in my life. My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table. I did a few small roles in tv series. I spend my days working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter. I am not sure that I should answer this question.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and adventurous with a love for exploration and health.
participant_2.background: My job is flexible, so I can take care of my health and still be productive. My dream is to travel the world and take pictures of my journey. My favorite food is Mexican. I fantasize about living in another country. I am a doctor.

content.text: I am so tired today. I feel like I have been running around all day.
I am so sorry to hear that. I have been doing some deep cleaning at home.
Oh that's not as bad as running around. I did a few small roles in tv shows.
Wow that's cool! I have always wanted to do that.
Really? I have been in a few commercials too.
That's amazing! I am a doctor so my schedule is pretty flexible.
You must work really hard. I am a volunteer at my local animal shelter.
That's so kind of you! I love animals. I fantasize about living in another country.
I would love to travel the world. I love to cook and my dad is a chef and my sister is a server so I have learned a lot.
I love Mexican food! I love to cook too but I am not very good at it.
I would love to cook with you some time.
That would be so much fun
